definition: Sichuanese pidgin (the mix of Standard Mandarin and Sichuanese dialect)/(Tw) surname Trump
abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China
(Tw) Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-

sentences.english: And even the most Clinton-leaning prognosticators allowed for some chance of a Trump win.
sentences.chinese: 即使最挺希拉里的预测家都认可川普有些机会赢。

sentences.english: Donald himself has yet to comment on the anatomical accuracy of the doll.
sentences.chinese: 川普自己已经承认了这个娃娃在解剖学上的精准性。

sentences.english: President-elect Trump has often used the expression "drain the swamp."
sentences.chinese: 候任总统川普经常使用“抽干沼泽”这种说法。

sentences.english: President Donald Trump has signed many documents in his first week in office.
sentences.chinese: 川普总统上任首周签署了很多文件。

sentences.english: The president said the order was vital for national security.
sentences.chinese: 川普总统说，旅游限令对国家安全至关重要。

sentences.english: She has said she believes Trump's win and the Brexit vote have helped her campaign.
sentences.chinese: 她说她相信川普的胜选和退欧公投帮助了她的竞选。

sentences.english: Trump was just declared the 45th president of the United States!
sentences.chinese: 川普刚刚被受任为第45任美国总统。
这些好战的川普支持者。

sentences.english: A statement from Kuczynski's office said Trump invited him to visit the United States.
sentences.chinese: 库琴斯基的办公室说，川普邀请他访问美国。

sentences.english: During his campaign for president, Trump strongly criticized the nuclear agreement.
sentences.chinese: 川普在总统竞选期间强烈批评了这份核协议。

sentences.english: Autrey said Trump was going to give him a check for $10,000 after the news conference.
sentences.chinese: 欧特里说，川普在记者会后给他一张一万美元的支票。

definition: Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
Barack Obama (1961-), US Democrat politician, president 2009-2017
Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Hillary (name)/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Taiwanese variant of 奧巴馬|奥巴马[Ao4 ba1 ma3], Barack Obama (1961-), US Democrat politician, president 2009-2017
Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
pinyin: Xi1 la1 li3 · Ke4 lin2 dun4
